Localization.Name: Heartseeker Double Bed
Localization.Description: With a luxurious bedspread featuring the iconic image of a spacesuit clad pilot that can be found on the Anvil Hornet Heartseeker, this opulent bed is framed by a red velvet, heart-shaped headboard that is sure to make every night a bit more pleasurable.
